"Commonly occurring Valentine!":
"Okaay, it has come this year!
Yes, it is the season of Valentine!
With that, if you mention Valentine,
you have Naura's Confectionery!
If you mention Naura's Confectionery...
Yes, you will understand what there is!
...I would like you to go out and help them!"

"さーって、今年もやってきました！
そう、バレンタインの季節だよっ！
そして、バレンタインといえば
ナウラのケーキ屋さん！
ナウラのケーキ屋さんといえば……
はい、もう何があったかわかるよねっ！
……助けに行ってあげて欲しいのっ！"
